title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: CEO of Oura has 4 predictions for the $80 billion wearable tech industry—including growing his customer base by millions of people
items.description: “The amount of data is getting bigger and broader," says CEO of Oura Tom Hale.

items.title: University of Virginia President Resigns Under Pressure From Trump Administration
items.description: The Justice Department had demanded that James E. Ryan step down in order to help resolve a civil rights investigation into the school.

items.title: The S&P 500 has retaken all-time highs. Here’s how much European and Chinese stocks raced ahead while U.S. markets regained lost ground
items.description: Where would the S&P 500 be today if Trump hadn't shocked Wall Street with much steeper-than-expected tariffs?

items.title: Supreme Court Punts Decision on Louisiana Voting Map Until Next Term
items.description: The justices asked that the case, which has implications for the political power of Black voters, be reargued next term.

items.description: Israel’s defense minister said Israel would strike if Iran seeks to develop long-range missiles or advance its nuclear program, despite a truce.
